author: .paulharris
content: teku will be ignoring BPO pre-fulu in devnet0

author: terencechain
content: Prysm can support BPO pre fulu, if BPO pre fulu is not specified, we'll fall back to using mas blobs per block electra

author: __flcl
content: In nethermind blob schedule works for any time post 4844. It's also required to set it for prague, otherwise cancun settings are used
